lead_paragraph: TAYLOR--Dr. Jim. We are deeply saddened to announce the death of our beloved James Allen Taylor, 68, who died on June 5, 2016. He is survived by his loving wife Eleanor Taylor, and daughters Katherine Polley (Ray), Lana Goddu, and Yulia Goddu, along with his grandchildren Raymond, Lauren, and Patrick Polley. He will be greatly missed by his family and legions of friends. Considered one of the world's most respected marketing and branding consultants, Dr. Taylor served as Global Chief Marketing Officer of Ernst & Young and Gateway Computers. Prior to that, Dr. Taylor was CEO of Yankelovich, Skelly & White. More recently, he was a Vice Chairman at YouGov and a consultant on major education research studies. In 2015, he became a professor at Michigan State University (MSU). He held a B.A. in Rhetoric from Berkeley, along with a Master's and Ph.D. in Communication from MSU, where he was recognized as a distinguished alumnus. A memorial service will be held at 3:00pm on June 23, at Trinity Church, 651 Pequot Ave., Southport, CT. 1/3
